thread.title: Main suspect in New Year's Eve attack on Reina nightclub in Istanbul captured
thread.title_full: Main suspect in New Year's Eve attack on Reina nightclub in Istanbul captured

author: Patrick Grafton-Green
title: Main suspect in New Year's Eve attack on Reina nightclub in Istanbul captured
text:
Monday 16 January 2017 21:49 BST Click to followThe Evening Standard Ambulances line up on a road leading up to the nightclub REUTERS 
The main suspect in the New Yearâ€™s Eve attack on a nightclub in Istanbul has been captured, according to Turkish media. 
Abdulkadir Masharipov, who is believed to have carried out the attack, was reportedly arrested by police in the Esenyurt district of the Turkish capital. 
The brutal attack by a lone gunman at the Reina nightclub on January 1 killed 39 people and left dozens more injured. 
The gunman fled the nightclub after carrying out the attack. 
Victims included citizens of Turkey, Saudi Arabia, Lebanon, Iraq, France, Tunisia, India, Morocco, Jordan, Kuwait, Canada, Israel, Syria, Belgium, Germany and Russia. 
This page is being updated. More about:
